TopicTitle: adding non 22 mods to the tech tree

Articles.Content: I know it is possible todo it but i dont know how to i looked through the config but i cannot find anything anyone know how to add mods to the techtree

Go to your KSP game data folder. Go to "Squad/parts/command/ MK1pod/

Go to the cfg and find where it says "tech tree level" something like that... copy and paste it into the CFG of the mod part and it then should be in the very first node of your tech tree.
